tool_description: Rest API that serves random, catagorized and filteres lighthearted familial insults/jokes
name: The Dozen - The Yo Mamsa Roast API
title: The Dozen - The Yo Mamsa Roast API
tool_name: The Dozen - The Yo Mamsa Roast API

api_list.name: Get All Jokes in a Single Category
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all joke  in a catagory.

All fat jokes.description: A list of all the available jokes in catagory passed as in the slug of the endpoint

api_list.name: Get a Random, Categorized and/or Filter Joke
api_list.description: Allows for either randomize, categorized or filtered insults to be returned with or without metadata.

optional_parameters.name: explicit
optional_parameters.description: Classification of the Joke to determine if it's content is considered explicit or otherwise NSFW.

optional_parameters.name: metadata
optional_parameters.description: To get the entire Joke, including metadata <sub>(date added, contributor, catagory, content, etc.)</sub>, set this to true. Default is false.

optional_parameters.name: catagory
optional_parameters.description: Jokes are catagorized based on content. To get a full list of categories, see the documentation for the `insult/categories` endpoint

api_list.name: Get Specific Insult
api_list.description: Allows for a specific insults to be returned with or without metadata.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: This is the UUID for a Specific Joke

api_list.name: Get All Joke Categories
api_list.description: Returns a list of all joke categories, whose as values can be used as a path or query parameter in other endpoints.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://the-dozen-the-yo-mamsa-roast-api.p.rapidapi.com/insult/categories"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "the-dozen-the-yo-mamsa-roast-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://the-dozen-the-yo-mamsa-roast-api.p.rapidapi.com/insult/categories"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "the-dozen-the-yo-mamsa-roast-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

Available Joke Categories.description: A list of all the available joke categories
